results.title: Lisinopril has a cardio-protective effect on experimental acute autoimmune myocarditis in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ has a cardio-protective effect on @DISEASE_Neoplasms_Experimental @DISEASE_MESH:D009374 @@@experimental@@@ acute @<m>DISEASE_Myocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@autoimmune myocarditis@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Atteya M, Mohamed RA, Ahmed AM, Abdel-Baky NA, Alfayez MA, Almalke HD, El Fouhil AF. Lisinopril has a cardio-protective effect on experimental acute autoimmune myocarditis in rats. Histol Histopathol. 2017 Apr;32(4):405-412. PMID: 27615269
citations.BibTeX: @article{27615269, title={Lisinopril has a cardio-protective effect on experimental acute autoimmune myocarditis in rats.}, author={Atteya M and Mohamed RA and Ahmed AM and Abdel-Baky NA and Alfayez MA and Almalke HD and El Fouhil AF}, journal={Histol Histopathol}, volume={32}, number={4}, pages={405-412}}

results.title: Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists in experimental myocarditis.
results.text_hl: One class of drugs commonly used in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Myocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@myocarditis@@@ includes the @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@angiotensin converting enzyme@@@ inhibitors, such as @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and the angiotensin Pi receptor antagonists, such as @CHEMICAL_L_158809 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C070967 @@@L-158,809@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@.

citations.NLM: Godsel LM, Leon JS, Engman DM. Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists in experimental myocarditis. Curr Pharm Des. 2003;9(9):723-35. PMID: 12570790
citations.BibTeX: @article{12570790, title={Angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors and angiotensin II receptor antagonists in experimental myocarditis.}, author={Godsel LM and Leon JS and Engman DM}, journal={Curr Pharm Des}, volume={9}, number={9}, pages={723-35}}

results.title: ACE inhibitor-induced angioedema of the small intestine: a case report.
results.text_hl: We report the case of a young female @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with recent diagnosis of @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ (@DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@ due to viral @<m>DISEASE_Myocarditis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@myocarditis@@@), who developed @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ of the small intestine three weeks after initiating treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Cuypers S, Van Meerbeeck S, De Pauw M. ACE inhibitor-induced angioedema of the small intestine: a case report. Acta Cardiol. 2011 Oct;66(5):645-8. PMID: 22032061
citations.BibTeX: @article{22032061, title={ACE inhibitor-induced angioedema of the small intestine: a case report.}, author={Cuypers S and Van Meerbeeck S and De Pauw M}, journal={Acta Cardiol}, volume={66}, number={5}, pages={645-8}}
